general.label: About
general.comment:
AJAX-ZOOM is a multipurpose library for displaying (high resolution) images and 360Â°/3D spins.
This Magento extension integrates only one particular implementation (example) from AJAX-ZOOM library into Magento.
The independent example can be found here: http://www.ajax-zoom.com/examples/example32.php
There you will also find some subtle details about the options which you can configure below.
The options below mainly refer to this one implementation / example.

However AJAX-ZOOM has many other options which can be set manually in /js/axzoom/axZm/zoomConfigCustom.inc.php after
elseif ($_GET['example'] == 'mouseOverExtension360Ver5'). You can also override any PHP options contained in /js/axzoom/axZm/zoomConfig.inc.php and /js/axzoom/axZm/zoomConfigCustom.inc.php by editing /js/axzoom/zoomConfigCustomAZ.inc.php

If you do not want to edit PHP files - most of the options can be also set in these formfields as JS plain object:
  1. azOptions - for 2D zoom
  2. azOptions360 - for 360/3D zoom

Depending on the template used you might need to adjust especially these two options:
  1. zoomWidth - width of the mouseover flyout window
  2. zoomHeight - height of the mouseover flyout window

If you will be not able to adjust these options on your own please ask for support

Other useful / most common options are marked green with this symbol:

resetbutton.label: Reset all options to default values
resetbutton.comment: Reset all options except licenses to their default values

lic.label: License
lic.comment: Ask for support    Buy a license

enableInFrontDetail.label: enableInFrontDetail
enableInFrontDetail.comment: Eneable / disable AJAX-ZOOM output in product detail view.

displayOnlyForThisProductID.label: displayOnlyForThisProductID
displayOnlyForThisProductID.comment: CSV with product IDs for which AJAX-ZOOM will be only enabled. Leave blank to have it enabled for all products! This option can be useful e.g. if you want to make A/B tests and enable AJAX-ZOOM only for certain products, e.g. 7,15 would enable AJAX-ZOOM only for products with ID 7 and 15.

default360settings.label: default360settings
default360settings.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Default configuration settings when importing / creating new 360 over backend.

pngModeCssFix.label: pngModeCssFix
pngModeCssFix.comment: Include CSS file for making some areas of the player transparent which only makes sense if pngMode option is set to auto or true and you are really using transparent png images.

magentoAllImages.label: magentoAllImages
magentoAllImages.comment: Load all images independent on label (color), also from "Simple Products" which are bind to Configurable Product on start.

magentoNoImage.label: magentoNoImage
magentoNoImage.comment: Show magento no image available, if no AJAX-ZOOM no image available will be shown.

magentoAdminThumb.label: magentoAdminThumb
magentoAdminThumb.comment: Replace normal images in admin area with dynamically generated thumbs of these images

galleryDivID.label: galleryDivID
galleryDivID.comment: DIV (container) id of the gallery, set to false to disable gallery.

disableAllMsg.label: disableAllMsg
disableAllMsg.comment: AJAX-ZOOM produces some notifications within the player telling that image tiles or other files are generating and returns the result. This happens only when an image or 360 images are opened for the first time. This is also the reason why preloading is slow at first. With this switch you can disable these notifications in the frontend.

dotNavigation.label: dotNavigation
dotNavigation.comment: Enable dot navigation if browser / device resolution is less than this value. See also "thumbSliderMinSize" option. Setting both - "dotNavigation" and "thumbSliderMinSize" to same value will result in dot navigation replacing gallery on devices with small resolution. Set to 0 to disable.

floorWidth.label: floorWidth
floorWidth.comment: Prevent browser computed width with decimals for AJAX-ZOOM containers.

pngMode.label: pngMode
pngMode.comment: Enable PNG mode in different ways: null will not change the configuration set in zoomConfig.inc.php or other php configuration files at all; auto, true and false will set pngMode setting in PHP. Auto means that cached thumbnails, image tiles etc. will be only kept as PNG if source images are PNG too. Transparancy is also preserved. If true, all cached images will be converted to PNG, even if they are JPG. If false, all cached images will be converted to JPG.

hideGalleryOneImage.label: hideGalleryOneImage
hideGalleryOneImage.comment: Instantly hide gallery if there is only one image, one video or one 360/3D.

hideGalleryAddClass.label: hideGalleryAddClass
hideGalleryAddClass.comment: This option is mainly for the layout with vertical gallery which is located next (left or right) to mouseover area. The most solid CSS layout for vertical gallery is when "divID" is wrapped by a div which has a left or right margin. This margin corresponds to vertical gallery width + some space in between. So if "hideGalleryOneImage" option is activated and there is only one image, only one 360 or no images / 360s at all, then the container represented by "galleryDivID" option is hidden and there is more space which can be filled. To do that we simply add a CSS class with margin 0 to the parent of "divID" overriding the left or right margin which is not needed for the gallery. You can change the "hideGalleryAddClass" to your own class name or set it to false to prevent this action.

galleryHover.label: galleryHover
galleryHover.comment: Use mouseenter (mouseover) for switching between images. You can specify an integer which will represent the time in ms to wait for switching after the mouse enters the thumb; true defaults to 200.

galleryAxZmThumbSlider.label: galleryAxZmThumbSlider
galleryAxZmThumbSlider.comment: Use $.axZmThumbSlider on gallery thumbnails or not.

galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamHorz.label: galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamHorz
galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamHorz.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
$.axZmThumbSlider options if "galleryAxZmThumbSlider" is enabled and gallery is horizontal. For full list of options see under: http://www.ajax-zoom.com/axZm/extensions/axZmThumbSlider/

galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamVert.label: galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamVert
galleryAxZmThumbSliderParamVert.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
$.axZmThumbSlider options if "galleryAxZmThumbSlider" is enabled and gallery is vertical. For full list of options see under: http://www.ajax-zoom.com/axZm/extensions/axZmThumbSlider/

thumbSliderPosition.label: thumbSliderPosition
thumbSliderPosition.comment: Position of the thumb slider. Possible values are left, top, right, bottom, as well as any combination of these separated with the dash, e.g. left-bottom.

thumbSliderPositionSwitch.label: thumbSliderPositionSwitch
thumbSliderPositionSwitch.comment: Possible values: "auto" as string or integer. Auto means depending on whether the screen is in portrait or landscape mode the first or second value of "thumbSliderPosition" suited for the resolution will be chosen. For the value set as integer the second position from "thumbSliderPosition" will be chosen if width of the screen is less than this integer and the position suits for current resolution.

thumbSliderMinSize.label: thumbSliderMinSize
thumbSliderMinSize.comment: Minimal browser width for the gallery to be displayed. See also "dotNavigation" option!

thumbSliderDimensionHorz.label: thumbSliderDimensionHorz
thumbSliderDimensionHorz.comment: Height of the container for the gallery when placed horizontally.

thumbSliderDimensionVert.label: thumbSliderDimensionVert
thumbSliderDimensionVert.comment: Width of the container for the gallery when placed vertically.

thumbSliderAutoSizeHorz.label: thumbSliderAutoSizeHorz
thumbSliderAutoSizeHorz.comment: Thumb CSS size will be set instantly depending on "thumbSliderDimensionHorz" and other options.

thumbSliderAutoSizeVert.label: thumbSliderAutoSizeVert
thumbSliderAutoSizeVert.comment: Thumb CSS size will be set instantly depending on "thumbSliderDimensionVert" and other options.

thumbSliderAutoMarginHorz.label: thumbSliderAutoMarginHorz
thumbSliderAutoMarginHorz.comment: Thumb margin when set instantly for horizontal gallery.

thumbSliderAutoMarginVert.label: thumbSliderAutoMarginVert
thumbSliderAutoMarginVert.comment: Thumb margin when set instantly for vertical gallery.

thumbSliderAutoExtendHorz.label: thumbSliderAutoExtendHorz
thumbSliderAutoExtendHorz.comment: Extend slider height by a fixed value when set instantly for horizontal gallery - "thumbSliderAutoSizeHorz".

thumbSliderAutoExtendVert.label: thumbSliderAutoExtendVert
thumbSliderAutoExtendVert.comment: Extend slider width by a fixed value when set instantly for vertical gallery - "thumbSliderAutoSizeVert"

thumbSliderHorzMargin.label: thumbSliderHorzMargin
thumbSliderHorzMargin.comment: Horizontal margin of the vertical gallery to mouseover container.

thumbsFadeIn.label: thumbsFadeIn
thumbsFadeIn.comment: Fadein duration / speed of the thumbnails added to the gallery.

thumbW.label: thumbW
thumbW.comment: Gallery image thumb width. Please note that when "galleryAxZmThumbSlider" is enabled, the final thumbnail width and height are determined by CSS set over "galleryAxZmThumbSliderParam".

thumbH.label: thumbH
thumbH.comment: Gallery image thumb height. Please note that when "galleryAxZmThumbSlider" is enabled, the final thumbnail width and height are determined by CSS set over "galleryAxZmThumbSliderParam".

thumbRetina.label: thumbRetina
thumbRetina.comment: Double resolution of the thumb image.

thumbMode.label: thumbMode
thumbMode.comment: Create thumbnails in a way similar to css background values cover and contain.

qualityThumb.label: qualityThumb
qualityThumb.comment: Jpeg quality of the gallery thumbs.

thumbIcon.label: thumbIcon
thumbIcon.comment: Place an icon over gallery thumbnail depending on media type. The icon has CSS class axZmThumbSliderIcon and the source is defined in "thumbIconFile" option.

thumbIconFile.label: thumbIconFile
thumbIconFile.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Source for icons placed over the thumbnails in the gallery. If only filename without path is defined the path presumed to be the /axZm/icons folder. You can also set complete different paths including the image filename instead.

thumbRetinaFs.label: thumbRetinaFs
thumbRetinaFs.comment: Double the resolution of fullscreen gallery image thumbs.

thumbModeFs.label: thumbModeFs
thumbModeFs.comment: Create thumbnails in a way similar to css background values cover and contain.

qualityThumbFs.label: qualityThumbFs
qualityThumbFs.comment: Jpeg Quality of the thumbnails in fullscreen gallery.

quality.label: quality
quality.comment: Jpeg quality of the preview image.

qualityZoom.label: qualityZoom
qualityZoom.comment: Jpeg quality of the zoom image shown in the flyout window.

firstImageToLoad.label: firstImageToLoad
firstImageToLoad.comment: Image from "images" option which should be loaded at first. See also "images360firstToLoad" option below. The "images" option does not exist as defineable option in AJAX-ZOOM modules / plugins for ecommerce systems because obviously the purpose of the modules is to set it instantly.

images360firstToLoad.label: images360firstToLoad
images360firstToLoad.comment: In case present load 360 from "images360" first and not an image from "images".

images360Thumb.label: images360Thumb
images360Thumb.comment: Show first image of the spin as thumb.

images360ThumbDefaultPostion.label: images360ThumbDefaultPostion
images360ThumbDefaultPostion.comment: Default position of the thumbnail representing a 360/3D in the gallery. The position can be also defined for each thumb individually. Possible values are: "first", "afterfirst" and "last". See also "videoThumbDefaultPostion" option.

images360ThumbBeforeVideo.label: images360ThumbBeforeVideo
images360ThumbBeforeVideo.comment: If activated thumbnails in the gallery representing a 360/3D will be appended before thumbnails representing videos.

images360Overlay.label: images360Overlay
images360Overlay.comment: Add a div with class "spinOverlImg" or "spinOverl" over the gallery thumb. On default it has a 360 icon as background.

images360Small.label: images360Small
images360Small.comment: Placeholder image when 360 is slided. If only filename without path is defined the path presumed to be the /axZm/icons folder. You can also set complete different paths including the image filename instead.

images360Big.label: images360Big
images360Big.comment: Placeholder image when 360 is slided. If only filename without path is defined the path presumed to be the /axZm/icons folder. You can also set complete different paths including the image filename instead.

images360example.label: images360example
images360example.comment: Configuration set which is passed to ajax-zoom when opening a 360/3D. The configuration set can be found in /axZm/zoomConfigCustom.inc.php

zoomMsg360.label: zoomMsg360
zoomMsg360.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Message displayed under mouse over zoom when 360 is loaded, e.g. "Drag to spin 360, scroll to zoom". For more than one language define a js object, e.g. {"en": "english text", "de": "german text"}

zoomMsg360_touch.label: zoomMsg360_touch
zoomMsg360_touch.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Message displayed under mouse over zoom when 360 is loaded on touch devices. For more than one language define a js object, e.g. {"en": "english text", "de": "german text"}

preloadMouseOverImages.label: preloadMouseOverImages
preloadMouseOverImages.comment: Preload all preview and mouseover images, possible values: false, true oder "oneByOne".

noImageAvailableClass.label: noImageAvailableClass
noImageAvailableClass.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
In case there are no images in "images", nor there are any in "images360", a div with some image as background can be appended to the container and receive this options value as CSS class. For more than one language define a js object, e.g. {"en": "axZm_mouseOverNoImage_en", "de": "axZm_mouseOverNoImage_de"}

width.label: width
width.comment: Width of the preview image or "auto" (depending on parent container size - "divID", see above). This is also the value which will be passed to your AJAX-ZOOM imaging server to generate this image on-the-fly. If width or height are set to "auto", both: width and height of the preview image are set to 50% of the value taken from "mouseOverZoomWidth", so on default it is 600px

height.label: height
height.comment: Height of the preview image or "auto" (depending on parent container size - "divID", see above). This is also the value which will be passed to your AJAX-ZOOM imaging server to generate this image on-the-fly. If width or height are set to "auto", both: width and height of the preview image are set to 50% of the value taken from "mouseOverZoomWidth", so on default it is 600px

oneSrcImg.label: oneSrcImg
oneSrcImg.comment: Use same image for "preview image" - the image which is hovered and the big "flyout image".

heightRatio.label: heightRatio
heightRatio.comment: "heightRatio" with instantly adjust the height of mouseover container depending on width calculated by the browser, e.g. 1.0 will always (only limited by "maxSizePrc" option) make height same as width; a value of 1.5 will make the preview like a portrait. You can also set "heightRatio" to "auto". In this case the height will be adjusted to cover available space instantly! Please note that when your images are not always same proportion, then the container will also change the size when the user switches to a different image.

heightRatioOneImg.label: heightRatioOneImg
heightRatioOneImg.comment: Overwrites "heightRatio" if only one image / 360 is present and e.g. gallery is instantly disabled. Set to "same" in order to prevent any impact on "heightRatio" option.

heightMaxWidthRatio.label: heightMaxWidthRatio
heightMaxWidthRatio.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript array! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Similar as you would set max-width: someValue @media only screen condition you can define "heightRatio" depending on the width of the browser, e.g. ["960|0.8", "700|0.7"]. You can define a string or js array with more than one conditions.

widthRatio.label: widthRatio
widthRatio.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript array! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Oposit of "heightRatio".

widthMaxHeightRatio.label: widthMaxHeightRatio
widthMaxHeightRatio.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript array! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Oposit of "heightMaxWidthRatio"

maxSizePrc.label: maxSizePrc
maxSizePrc.comment: Limit the actual height if "heightRatio" option is set. Setting "heightRatio" option may result in that the height of the mouseover zoom is bigger than window height and the image is not fully visible. To prevent this you can limit the calculated height with this "maxSizePrc" option. The value of 1.0 would limit the height to 100% of window height; a value of 0.8 to 80% of window height; you can also define two values, e.g. '1.0|-120' which would be window height minus 120px.

mouseOverZoomWidth.label: mouseOverZoomWidth
mouseOverZoomWidth.comment: Max width of the image that will be shown in the zoom window; this is the value which will be passed to your AJAX-ZOOM imaging server to generate this image on-the-fly. Please note that the size is limited by $zoom['config']['allowDynamicThumbsMaxSize'] which is can be set in '/axZm/zoomConfig.inc.php'. You can also specify a link to the image, see "images" option above. To set the width of the fly out window see "zoomWidth" under "mouseOverZoomParam".

mouseOverZoomHeight.label: mouseOverZoomHeight
mouseOverZoomHeight.comment: Max height of the image that will be shown in the zoom window; this is the value which will be passed to your AJAX-ZOOM imaging server to generate this image on-the-fly. Please note that the size is limited by $zoom['config']['allowDynamicThumbsMaxSize'] which is can be set in '/axZm/zoomConfig.inc.php'. You can also specify a link to the image, see "images" option above. To set the height of the fly out window see "zoomHeight" under "mouseOverZoomParam".

mouseOverContain.label: mouseOverContain
mouseOverContain.comment: Create preview and the image, which is shown in the zoom window, with the same size / proportion as it is set in "mouseOverZoomWidth" and "mouseOverZoomHeight" options. Empty space will be filled with white color or kept transparent for png images.

ajaxZoomOpenMode.label: ajaxZoomOpenMode
ajaxZoomOpenMode.comment: Determines how AJAX-ZOOM is opened when the user clicks on preview images / lens, possible values: 'fullscreen' (see also "fullScreenApi" option below) or 'fancyboxFullscreen'.

ajaxZoomOpenModeTouch.label: ajaxZoomOpenModeTouch
ajaxZoomOpenModeTouch.comment: Determines how AJAX-ZOOM is opened when the user touch - clicks on preview images / lens, possible values: 'fullscreen' and 'fancyboxFullscreen'.

fancyBoxFullscreenParam.label: fancyBoxFullscreenParam
fancyBoxFullscreenParam.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
If fancyboxFullscreen is used in "ajaxZoomOpenMode" option, Fancybox options. Prefixed with box and capitalized first letter!

example.label: example
example.comment: Configuration set which is passed to ajax-zoom when opening a 2D image. The configuration set can be found in /axZm/zoomConfigCustom.inc.php

exampleFancyboxFullscreen.label: exampleFancyboxFullscreen
exampleFancyboxFullscreen.comment: Configuration set which is passed to ajax-zoom when ajaxZoomOpenMode is 'fancyboxFullscreen'.

enforceFullScreenRes.label: enforceFullScreenRes
enforceFullScreenRes.comment: Enforce "ajaxZoomOpenMode" to be "fullscreen" if screen width is less than this value.

prevNextArrows.label: prevNextArrows
prevNextArrows.comment: Put prev / next buttons over mouseover zoom. CSS: .axZm_mouseOverPrevNextArrows;

prevNextArrowsTouch.label: prevNextArrowsTouch
prevNextArrowsTouch.comment: Put prev / next buttons over mouseover zoom for touch devices. CSS: .axZm_mouseOverPrevNextArrows;

prevNextArrowsSlide.label: prevNextArrowsSlide
prevNextArrowsSlide.comment: Slide images to right or left when clicked on the prev / next buttons.

disableScrollAnm.label: disableScrollAnm
disableScrollAnm.comment: Disable animation while zooming with AJAX-ZOOM and using mousewheel.

fullScreenApi.label: fullScreenApi
fullScreenApi.comment: Try to open AJAX-ZOOM at browsers fullscreen mode, possible on modern browsers except IE < 10 and mobile.

azOptions.label: azOptions
azOptions.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Some AJAX-ZOOM options can be set with JS when AJAX-ZOOM is inited. Normally you would be defining them in /axZm/zoomConfig.inc.php or /axZm/zoomConfigCustom.inc.php; this field is for convenience reasons. Example: {"fullScreenCornerButton": false} - this would disable the button for fullscreen.

azOptions360.label: azOptions360
azOptions360.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Same as above but specifically for 360/3D. In AJAX-ZOOM modules for ecommerce systems you can also set these options for each 360 individually... As an example for setting this option manually would be such an object: {"mouseScrollEnable": true, "mNavi": {"enabled": true, "gravity": "bottomLeft", "order": {"mZoomOut": 5, "mZoomIn": 15}}}

postMode.label: postMode
postMode.comment: Set AJAX-ZOOM to use POST instead of GET.

cropAxZmThumbSliderParam.label: cropAxZmThumbSliderParam
cropAxZmThumbSliderParam.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Slider settings for 360Â° "Product Tour". Can be kept empty. See also "galleryAxZmThumbSliderParam" option for more info.

cropSliderPosition.label: cropSliderPosition
cropSliderPosition.comment: Position of the 360Â° "Product Tour" slider, possible values: "top", "right", "bottom", "left" and any combination between those separated with dash.

cropSliderPositionSwitch.label: cropSliderPositionSwitch
cropSliderPositionSwitch.comment: Possible values: "auto" as string or integer. Auto means depending on whether the screen is in portrait or landscape mode the first or second value of "cropSliderPosition" suited for the resolution will be chosen. For the value set as integer the second position from "cropSliderPosition" will be chosen if width of the screen is less than this integer and the position suits for current resolution.

cropSliderPosPriority.label: cropSliderPosPriority
cropSliderPosPriority.comment: Prioritize placing 360Â° "Product Tour" slider, defined in "cropSliderPosition", before positioning fullscreen thumbnail slider, defined in "fsSliderPosition".

cropSliderReposition.label: cropSliderReposition
cropSliderReposition.comment: In case the positions of the gallery slider and the slider for 360 Product tour collude, the alternative position. Possible values: "left-bottom", "left-top", "right-bottom", "right-top" and "opposite".

cropSliderDimension.label: cropSliderDimension
cropSliderDimension.comment: Width or height (depending on position) of the instantly created container for the 360Â° "Product Tour" thumb slider.

cropSliderThumbAutoSize.label: cropSliderThumbAutoSize
cropSliderThumbAutoSize.comment: Thumb CSS size will be set instantly depending on "cropSliderDimension" option.

cropSliderThumbDescr.label: cropSliderThumbDescr
cropSliderThumbDescr.comment: Enable descriptions for the thumbs in the slider for 360Â° "Product Tour"

cropSliderMinSize.label: cropSliderMinSize
cropSliderMinSize.comment: Minimal size of the player (width or height) for 360Â° "Product Tour" gallery (if present) to be shown.

cropSliderNotParent.label: cropSliderNotParent
cropSliderNotParent.comment: Prevent showing 360Â° "Product Tour" gallery when the parent container matches the id or CSS class represented as string in this option value, e.g. "az_mouseOverZoomContainer". For more than one value split them with vertical dash.

cropAxZmEbOpt.label: cropAxZmEbOpt
cropAxZmEbOpt.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Options for $.axZmEb function which is used for descriptions for 360Â° "Product Tour". Documentation to be updated...

fsAxZmThumbSliderParam.label: fsAxZmThumbSliderParam
fsAxZmThumbSliderParam.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
$.axZmThumbSlider options for fullscreen gallery. For full list of options see under: /modules/ajaxzoom/axZm/extensions/axZmThumbSlider/

fsSliderPosition.label: fsSliderPosition
fsSliderPosition.comment: Position of the fullscreen thumbnail slider. Possible values are: "top", "right", "bottom", "left" and any combination between those separated with dash, e.g. "right-bottom". Positions with dash mean that the second after dash is the alternative position which could be switched instantly depending on the logic described in "fsSliderPositionSwitch" option.

fsSliderReposition.label: fsSliderReposition
fsSliderReposition.comment: In case sliders position collude, the alternative position. Possible values: "left-bottom", "left-top", "right-bottom", "right-top", "opposite".

fsSliderPositionSwitch.label: fsSliderPositionSwitch
fsSliderPositionSwitch.comment: Switch fsSliderPosition instantly depending on certain conditions. This switch is only applied when fsSliderPosition value is "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left" or "bottom-right". Possible values are "auto" or integer; When "auto" is enabled an alternative position will be chosen depending on screen being in portrait or landscape mode. If value of fsSliderPositionSwitch is integer, alternative position will be only chosen if screen width (or height - depending on first value of fsSliderPosition before dash) is less than fsSliderPositionSwitch value.

fsSliderDimension.label: fsSliderDimension
fsSliderDimension.comment: Width or height of the container for fullscreen slider (depends on if it is vertical or horizontal).

fsSliderThumbAutoSize.label: fsSliderThumbAutoSize
fsSliderThumbAutoSize.comment: Adjust fsSliderDimension depending on fsAxZmThumbSliderParam instantly (to be improved).

fsSliderThumbAutoMargin.label: fsSliderThumbAutoMargin
fsSliderThumbAutoMargin.comment: Thumbnails margin when fsSliderThumbAutoSize is enabled.

fsSliderThumbAutoExtend.label: fsSliderThumbAutoExtend
fsSliderThumbAutoExtend.comment: Extend slider width / height by this pixel value when set instantly.

fsSliderMinSize.label: fsSliderMinSize
fsSliderMinSize.comment: Minimal size of the player for fullscreen gallery to be shown.

fsSliderGalleryFadeInAnm.label: fsSliderGalleryFadeInAnm
fsSliderGalleryFadeInAnm.comment: Switching animation between images in fullscreen mode. Possible values: "Center", "Top", "Right", "Bottom", "Left", "StretchVert", "StretchHorz", "SwipeHorz", "SwipeVert", "Vert", "Horz".

fsSliderNotParent.label: fsSliderNotParent
fsSliderNotParent.comment: Prevent showing fullscreen gallery when the parent container matches the id or CSS class represented as string in this option value, e.g. "az_mouseOverZoomContainer". For more than one value split them with vertical dash.

onGallerySwitch.label: onGallerySwitch
onGallerySwitch.comment: Callback function triggered every time an item is switched. The function receives 4 argumets: index of the item, item information as object, mouseover instance and gallery instance. In AJAX-ZOOM modules avoid writing the actual functions, instead pass a reference, e.g. window.myCustomFunc

mouseover.label: Specific options for the mouseover zoom

position.label: position
position.comment: Position of the flyout zoom window, possible values: "inside", "top", "right", "bottom", "left".

posAutoInside.label: posAutoInside

touchScroll.label: touchScroll
touchScroll.comment: If width of the mouseover zoom container is more than 80% (0.8) of the window width, then for touch devises the inner zoom will be not triggered and the user can scroll down. Click for open AJAX-ZOOM remains. Set this value to 0 if you want to enable the slider for touch devices only.

noMouseOverZoom.label: noMouseOverZoom
noMouseOverZoom.comment: Disable mouseover zoom for all devices.

noMouseOverZoomTouch.label: noMouseOverZoomTouch
noMouseOverZoomTouch.comment: Enable "noMouseOverZoom" only for touch devices (mouseover zoom works for touch devices too but is not very convenient so this option is enabled on default now).

noMouseOverZoomInside.label: noMouseOverZoomInside
noMouseOverZoomInside.comment: Disable mouseover zoom if it is 'inside' (inner zoom).

noMouseOverZoomInsideTouch.label: noMouseOverZoomInsideTouch
noMouseOverZoomInsideTouch.comment: Disable mouseover zoom if it is inside (inner zoom) and touch event.

mouseOverZoomHybrid.label: mouseOverZoomHybrid
mouseOverZoomHybrid.comment: Enable mouseover zoom and slider at the same time for not touch devices.

slideTouchTime.label: slideTouchTime
slideTouchTime.comment: Slide time in ms after touch and drag.

slideTime.label: slideTime
slideTime.comment: Slide time after clicked on prev / next buttons.

posInsideArea.label: posInsideArea
posInsideArea.comment: When "posAutoInside" is enabled and inner zoom fires or "position" option is set to 'inside' right away - there is no lens. However you will notice that the reaction to mouse movements occure somewhere in the middle of the image; at the edges mostly nothing happens in similar scripts. With this option you can adjust how far from the edge mouse movements should be captured. The range is between 0 and 0.5;

autoFlip.label: autoFlip
autoFlip.comment: Flip right to left and bottom to top if less than int px value or false to disable.

biggestSpace.label: biggestSpace
biggestSpace.comment: Overrides position option and instantly chooses the direction, disables autoFlip; plays nicely when zoomWidth and zoomHeight are set to 'auto'.

zoomFullSpace.label: zoomFullSpace
zoomFullSpace.comment: Uses full screen height (does not align to the map / disables adjustY) if position is right or left || uses full screen width (does not align to the map / disables adjustX) if position is top or bottom.

zoomWidth.label: zoomWidth
zoomWidth.comment: Width of the zoom window e.g. 540 or 'auto' or jQuery selector|correction value, e.g. '#refWidthTest|+20'; so if you want to have a width of the zoom window same as for example a responsive container to the right (so it is fully covered) and max possible height, then define the id of this container to the right, e.g. 'myArticleData', set "zoomWidth" to '#myArticleData|+10' and "zoomHeight" to 'auto'. If you have a three column design and want to cover both containers to the right, then just define both containers in the jQuery selector, e.g. '.pb-center-column,.pb-right-column|+20'; the margin between the containers is not taken into account but you can adjust the result with the second value after vertical bar.

zoomHeight.label: zoomHeight
zoomHeight.comment: Height of the zoom window e.g. 375, or 'auto' or jQuery selector|correction value, e.g. '#refWidthTest|+20'; if your selector matches more than one element, e.g. '.pb-center-column,.pb-right-column|+20', then the highest value will be chosen. This is different from the multiple selector in "zoomWidth", where the values are added.

autoMargin.label: autoMargin
autoMargin.comment: If zoomWidth or zoomHeight are set to 'auto', the margin to the edge of the screen.

adjustX.label: adjustX
adjustX.comment: Horizontal margin of the zoom window.

adjustY.label: adjustY
adjustY.comment: Vertical margin of the zoom window.

lensStyle.label: lensStyle
lensStyle.comment: Quickly override CSS of the lens.

lensClass.label: lensClass
lensClass.comment: Define CSS class for the lens.

lensMessage.label: lensMessage
lensMessage.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Text string on the lens. For more than one language define a js object, e.g. {"en": "english text", "de": "german text"}

zoomAreaBorderWidth.label: zoomAreaBorderWidth
zoomAreaBorderWidth.comment: Border thickness of the zoom window.

galleryFade.label: galleryFade
galleryFade.comment: Speed of inner fade or false.

shutterSpeed.label: shutterSpeed
shutterSpeed.comment: Speed of shutter fadein or false; applies only if image proportions are different from container.

showFade.label: showFade
showFade.comment: Speed of fade in for mouse over.

hideFade.label: hideFade
hideFade.comment: Speed of fade out for mouse over.

flyOutSpeed.label: flyOutSpeed
flyOutSpeed.comment: Speed for flyout or false to disable.

flyBackSpeed.label: flyBackSpeed
flyBackSpeed.comment: Speed for fly back or false to disable.

flyBackTransition.label: flyBackTransition
flyBackTransition.comment: Transition type of the fly back.

autoScroll.label: autoScroll
autoScroll.comment: Scroll page when clicked on the thumb and the mouse over preview image is not fully visible.

smoothMove.label: smoothMove
smoothMove.comment: Integer bigger than 1 indicates smoother movements. Set 0 to disable.

tint.label: tint
tint.comment: Color value around the lens or false.

tintOpacity.label: tintOpacity
tintOpacity.comment: Opacity of the area around the lens when "tint" option is set to some color value.

tintFilter.label: tintFilter

tintFilterBack.label: tintFilterBack
tintFilterBack.comment: Background-color if some "tintFilter" is enabled, e.g. #FFF

tintLensBack.label: tintLensBack
tintLensBack.comment: Show background image in the lens.

showTitle.label: showTitle
showTitle.comment: Enable / disable title on zoom window

titlePosition.label: titlePosition
titlePosition.comment: Position of the title, possible values are: 'top', 'bottom' or 'above'.

titleParentContainer.label: titleParentContainer
titleParentContainer.comment: jQuery selector, e.g. #abc_title, as parent container for title other than inside the lense, can be anywhere.

titlePermanent.label: titlePermanent
titlePermanent.comment: When "titleParentContainer" is defined, title (text) will be set after loading / switch of the image.

cursorPositionX.label: cursorPositionX
cursorPositionX.comment: Cursor over lens horizontal offset, 0.5 is middle

cursorPositionY.label: cursorPositionY
cursorPositionY.comment: Cursor over lens vertical offset, 0.5 is middle.

loading.label: loading
loading.comment: Display loading information, CSS class: .mouseOverLoading; See also "spinner" option.

loadingMessage.label: loadingMessage
loadingMessage.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Loading message, not needed, can be just the "spinner" - see below.

zoomHintEnable.label: zoomHintEnable

zoomHintText.label: zoomHintText
zoomHintText.comment:
Attention: you are editing JavaScript object! Errors will lead to AJAX-ZOOM not working properly.
Text which will be appended next to the icon enabled by "zoomHintEnable". For more than one language define a js object, e.g. {"en": "english text", "de": "german text"}

zoomMsgHover.label: zoomMsgHover

zoomMsgHoverTouch.label: zoomMsgHoverTouch

zoomMsgClick.label: zoomMsgClick

slideInTime.label: slideInTime
slideInTime.comment: Slide in time if "noMouseOverZoom" is enabled or "touchScroll" option enables for touch devices.

slideInEasingCSS3.label: slideInEasingCSS3
slideInEasingCSS3.comment: jQuery equivalent of easing or own function (string), e.g. "cubic-bezier(0.21,0.51,0.4,2.02)", see also cubic-bezier.com

slideInEasing.label: slideInEasing
slideInEasing.comment: jQuery easing function for sliding in (fallback if CSS3 animation is not supported).

slideInScale.label: slideInScale
slideInScale.comment: Scale initial size (goes eventually to 1.0 while animation).

slideOutDest.label: slideOutDest
slideOutDest.comment: Target slideout position, possible values: 1, 2, 3 or 4;

onInit.label: onInit
onInit.comment: Callback JS function or reference ot it.

onLoad.label: onLoad
onLoad.comment: Callback JS function or reference ot it.

onImageChange.label: onImageChange
onImageChange.comment: Callback JS function or reference ot it.

onMouseOver.label: onMouseOver
onMouseOver.comment: Callback JS function or reference ot it.

onMouseOut.label: onMouseOut
onMouseOut.comment: Callback JS function or reference ot it.

spinner.label: spinner
spinner.comment: Use ajax loading spinner without gif files etc. Set to false to disable.

spinnerParam.label: spinnerParam
spinnerParam.comment: Spinner options, for more info see: http://fgnass.github.com/spin.js/
